titles.title: Providing for the printing of the book entitled "History of the United States House of Representatives".

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on House Administration.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Personnel and Police.
Subcommittee Consideration and Mark-up Session Held.
Forwarded by Subcommittee to Full Committee (Amended) by Voice Vote.
Committee Consideration and Mark-up Session Held.

calendar.text: Ordered to be Reported (Amended) by Voice Vote.

action.text: Mr. Manton asked unanimous consent to discharge from committee and consider.
Considered by unanimous consent. (consideration: CR 10/6/1994 H11164-11165)
Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.

vote.text: On agreeing to the resolution Agreed to without objection.

action.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.

vote.text: Received in the Senate, considered, and agreed to without amendment by Voice Vote.

action.text: Message on Senate action sent to the House.

bill.summary: 10/7/1994--Passed House amended. Provides for the printing of a revised edition of the book entitled "History of the United States House of Representatives" as a House document.
